pullrequest.title: Fix auto enable of AtlasSimInterface blob in catkin ws

content.raw: I am guessing we originally had this in top-level cmake so we could also skip install of libAtlasSimInterface in 32bit architectures in gazebo_model_resources?  I guess we never implemented that part, and there is no harm in installing the binary anyways.
content.html: I am guessing we originally had this in top-level cmake so we could also skip install of libAtlasSimInterface in 32bit architectures in gazebo_model_resources? I guess we never implemented that part, and there is no harm in installing the binary anyways.
